name: Survival Challenge - 3D Battle
description:
Can you pass all the survival challenge?
Welcome to the lastest and fun game of 2021.Try the ultimate survival game and challenge your self to win the prize money. You are one of many players that accepted the mysterious ivitation to participate in a crazy game.
Be careful with all your move or you will be eliminated. If you do not complete the task in a limited time, the door of hell welcome to you.
The adventure awaits you. Challenge now!
